alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 3:15AM PST until March 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in most valleys, with 3 to 8 inches in mountains. West Wendover will see minimal snowfall. * WHERE...Southeastern Elko County and Southwest Elko County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy winds Saturday could lead to some blowing/drifting snow, which could reduce visibility and further worsen travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County
